item.title: Priority queue
item.description: Priority queue Priority queue is similar to normal queue or stack, except every element has a priority. Priority queue is usually implemented as heap. Heap Heap is a tree data structure, it is almost complete binary tree. Common implementation of heap is the binary heap. left child 2i+1 right child 2i+2 parent i / 2 - 1
